recipe_name: Marinated red cabbage and walnut salad
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the red cabbage, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, walnuts, and coriander into a bowl. Mix well and leave to marinate for five minutes. To serve, place the salad onto a plate and top with the orange slices.
ingredients: ½ red cabbage, thinly sliced ,  3 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  5 tbsp olive oil,  50g/1¾oz walnuts, chopped ,  1 handful fresh coriander, chopped ,  2 oranges, peeled, segmented
